item.title: I'm Only Excited For The Reboot Of Sylvester Stallone's 68% RT Thriller Because Of This 2024 Action Movie From The Same Director
item.description: While the Cliffhanger reboot has faced issues with Sylvester Stallone no longer involved, this thriller from the same director is cause for optimism.

item.title: What's Going On With The Batman 2? (2025 Edition)
item.description: The Batman - Part II has progressed suspiciously slowly after two full-year delays. New updates provide more information about the DC sequel's status.

item.title: Alex Garland Had To Warn His Actors Before They Starred In His Civil War Follow-Up Warfare: “It’s Going To Be Very Intense”
item.description: ScreenRant interviews Warfare stars including Joseph Quinn, D’Pharaoh Woon-A-Tai, and Cosmo Jarvis about their work on Alex Garland’s latest.
